concept.title: virtual appliances
concept.shortdesc: A production-ready virtual appliance can now be integrated into a cloud solution.

conbody.p: Cloud computing, often referred to as “the cloud,” is the delivery of on-demand computing resources over the internet on a pay-for-use basis. You can now deploy in the SoftLayer cloud. SoftLayer, an IBM company, is a global cloud infrastructure provider.
Installing the virtual appliance on existing servers through virtualization technology provides a number of benefits:

ul.li: Improve the utilization of hardware by being able to access the virtual appliance at anytime, from anywhere.

Reduce the costs of hardware operation and maintenance by being able to buy the software that you need without the cost of in-house maintenance of the infrastructure. You can scale up or down to meet demand.
Use cloud computing to innovate quickly by being able to rapidly build cloud applications. The applications that you develop can then be deployed into development, test, and production environments.

section.title: for Developers
section.p: You can also download for Developers. for Developers is a useful tool for developers to start creating applications that work with without needing the physical appliance to develop and test the application. It is a virtual appliance that is suitable for deploying in VMWare and VirtualBox environments. The benefit of this developer-focused virtual appliance is that it enables developers to get started quickly in coding and testing applications to work with . For more information about downloading for Developers, see the virtual appliance download site.
